title: PREMIUM-Ep 202 Follow-Up: Close Reading of Kristeva's "Approaching Abjection"
description:
Mark takes a very close look at pages 1–4 of the first chapter of On Powers of Horror: An Essay on Abjection (1980) as a supplement to episode 202.

Get the full, 55-minute experience as a PEL Citizen, or get it by supporting us on Patreon for a mere $1!
